46 -    def search(self): 

47          ''' 
48          Get DOAP by its URL or file path 
49   
50          @rtype: unicode 
51          @return: DOAP 
52          ''' 
53          try: 
54              return fetch_doap(self.options.url, self.options.proxy) 
55          except NotFoundError: 
56              print "Not found: %s" % self.options.url
